atae/saab0509/P528284
{NA₄}KIŠIB {m}la-TEŠ₂-a-ni-aš-šur DUMU {m}{d}PA-ka-šir {LU₂}TUR ša₂ {m}{d}PA-ŠU Bel MI₂ SUM-a-ni   {MI₂}ra-hi-ma-a GEME₂-šu u₂-piš-ma Aššur-eriba ina ŠA₃ 1 1/2 MA.NA KU₃.UD ina 01 MA-e ša Gargamis TA IGI {m}NU-TEŠ₂-ni-aš-šur TI kas-pu gam-mur ta-din MI₂ šu₂-a-tu₂ zar-pat la-qi-at tu₂-a-ru de-e-nu DUG₄.DUG₄ la-a-šu man-nu ša ina ur-kiš ina ma-te-me lu-u {m}NU-TEŠ₂-a-ni-aš-šur lu-u DUMU.MEŠ-šu₂ lu-u me-me-ni-šu₂ ša₂ de-nu DUG₄.DUG₄ TA Aššur-eriba DUMU-MEŠ-šu₂ ub-ta-u-ni ma-a GEME₂ a-paṭ-ṭar kas-pu a-na 10.MEŠ a-na EN.MEŠ-šu₂ GUR-ra ina de-ni-šu DUG₄.DUG₄-ma la i-laq-qi Aššur Šamaš Bel Nabu Issar ša₂ Arbail lu EN-de-ni-šu ṣib-te be-e-nu a-na 01-me UD-me sa-ar-tu₂ a-na DU₃ MU.AN.NA.MEŠ  IGI {m}ša₂-kil-ia IGI Kiṣir-Aššur IGI Aššur-abu-uṣur IGI {m}aš-šur-de-nu-a-mur IGI {m}{d}UTU-a-na-de-ni-ia IGI Aššur-balassu-iqbi IGI Ubru-Nergal IGI Šar-ili  Ayari UD-11-KAM₂ lim-mu Bel-iqbi ša {KUR}za-man
